title: I know it's a goofy question, but...
body: This is a goofy question, but what patch is out currently?  8.24 or 8.24b?  My in-game patch number says 8.24, but today in a game I noticed Timat was listed at 1325 gold, but in the Item tool under the collection tab Timat is listed as 1200 gp.  Talk about confusing.... :(

replies.body: 8.24b is just the hotfix patch they already sent out. so yes we are in 8.24b (which is still patch 8.24 just the hotfixed version.)

I am buying 100 Tiamat and then sell them for 1250 after the patch.
{{sticker:draven-pose}}
